data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Haute-Corse, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haute-Corse, Corse, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Haute-Corse
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Haute-Corse, Corse, France. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, may the churches in Haute-Corse, Corse, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bastia
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bastia, Corse, France.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Haute-Corse, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 2,053 believers in Haute-Corse, Corse, France to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary:
the county of Haute-Corse, Corse, France has a population of 167,100.

We estimate Haute-Corse has 2,053 people who might know Jesus, 102,185 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 62,862 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 2,053 believers in Haute-Corse, Corse, France how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
